post.summary: Registers a new user with metadata and triggers confirmation email.
Authenticates a user and establishes an Identity cookie for subsequent authorization flows.
Signs the current user out of the Identity cookie session.

get.summary: Returns the configured profile field definitions.

post.summary: Confirms a user's email address using the confirmation token.
Resends the confirmation email when the account is not yet confirmed.
Generates a password reset token and sends the reset email if the account exists.
Resets the user's password using the provided token.
Starts authenticator app enrollment and returns the shared key and otpauth URI.
Verifies an authenticator code. Works for both enrollment and login step-up.
Sends an MFA challenge via the selected method (e.g., SMS).
Disables authenticator MFA for the current user.
Generates new recovery codes for the current user.

get.summary: Starts an external authentication challenge for the specified provider.
Handles the callback from an external authentication provider.

delete.summary: Removes a linked external authentication provider from the current user.

get.summary: Returns the current user's profile and metadata.

put.summary: Updates the current user's profile metadata.

post.summary: Changes the current user's password.

get.summary: Returns a paged list of users for administration.

post.summary: Creates a new user with optional roles and invitation emails.

get.summary: Returns details for a specific user, including roles and MFA state.

put.summary: Updates user profile flags and metadata.

delete.summary: Soft deletes the user by disabling access.

post.summary: Locks a user account until explicitly unlocked.
Clears the lockout state for a user account.
Generates a password reset token and sends invitation email to the user.
Disables MFA for the user and resets the authenticator key.
Resends the account confirmation email if the user is unconfirmed.

get.summary: Returns the set of roles currently assigned to the user.

put.summary: Replaces the role assignments for the user.

post.summary: Restores a previously soft-deleted user.

get.summary: Returns a paged list of roles and their permissions.

post.summary: Creates a new role definition with permissions.

delete.summary: Deletes a role when not system and unused.

get.summary: Returns a paged list of permissions and usage counts.

post.summary: Registers a new user through an invitation and assigns organization membership.
